comments: T(h,k) = number of periodic binary words of k 1's and h-k 0's.
maple: A050186 := proc(n,k)        if n = 0 then                1;        else        add (numtheory[mobius](d)*binomial(n/d,k/d),d =numtheory[divisors](igcd(n,k))) ;        end if;end proc:A050870 := proc(n,k)        binomial(n,k)-A050186(n,k) ;end proc:seq(seq(A050870(n,k),k=0..n),n=0..20) ; # _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 24 2011
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 29 2008
